name: ADDITOL速 VXL 4950
description: ADDITOL速 VXL 4950 is a specialized adhesion-promoting primer formulated for plastics, specifically designed for application as a pre-treatment primer. It is crucial to note that ADDITOL速 VXL 4950 is not intended for use as an additive in paints. With a focus on marine coatings, this primer enhances adhesion when applied before the coating process. Its application methods include brush, roller, and spray, ensuring versatility in different coating scenarios. The appearance of ADDITOL速 VXL 4950 is clear, contributing to its suitability for various plastic substrates in marine coating applications.
